programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: S'no Job
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E23, Danny's father Stu asks Doug to arrange a job interview for Danny at IPS. Doug however doesn't want Danny to work with him.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Ticker Treat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E06, Doug's Halloween decorations put Arthur in the hospital; Deacon doesn't like Kirby's choice of a Halloween costume.

programme.title: Lyin' Hearted
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E07, Doug runs into a business acquaintance while bringing Arthur to the hospital for heart surgery; Carrie discovers an old college acceptance letter.

programme.title: Life Sentence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E08, Doug and his friends become victims of reality TV when Doug sets up a camera in the basement to keep an eye on Arthur.

programme.title: Veiled Threat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E09, Doug and Carrie experience a flashback to their wedding day after finding a piece of wedding cake in their freezer.

programme.title: Oxy Moron
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E10, Doug tries to prove he would protect Carrie in a life-or-death situation after he makes a dumb move while on a rough plane ride.

programme.title: Depo Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E11, Carrie asks Doug to be a witness at her boss's trial, but then fears he won't be professional in the courtroom.

programme.title: Ovary Action
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E12, The holidays and Doug's parents descend on the household as Doug and Carrie attempt to conceive a baby.

programme.title: Food Fight
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E13, Carrie grows jealous when Spence's girlfriend (Christine Nelson) recruits Doug to test her culinary homework.

programme.title: Double Downer
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E14, Doug spoils Carrie's plans for a romantic weekend when he organizes an outing to Atlantic City -- and his boss ends up joining them.

programme.title: Dougie Nights
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E15, Doug becomes addicted to the night life after he agrees to go club hopping with Deacon to help snap him out of his depression.

programme.title: No Orleans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E16, Doug and Carrie sneak off to New Orleans after having promised his cousins they would never travel there without them. Peter Scolari guest stars.

programme.title: Missing Links
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E17, Carrie and Doug try to find a date for Deacon so they can all golf together as a foursome at the country club.

programme.title: Hero Worship
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E18, Doug's uncle (guest star Gavin MacLeod) offers financial backing when Doug expresses a desire to open a sandwich shop.

programme.title: Screwed Driver
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E19, Doug starts acting like a child when Carrie goes on a business trip and his parents come for a visit.

programme.title: Lush Life
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E20, Doug tries to get Carrie drunk so he can cheat on his diet, but things get out of hand. Lou Ferrigno guest stars.

programme.title: Bun Dummy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E21, Doug hates Carrie's new hairstyle but can't bring himself to tell her the truth; Spence dreads an upcoming reunion with a former teacher.

programme.title: Patrons Ain't
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E22, When their accountant makes them feel guilty about their lack of charitable donations, Doug and Carrie decide to make a large donation to a school library.

programme.title: Eddie Money
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E23, Doug tries to keep $5,000 in gambling winnings a secret from Carrie, who didn't want him betting to begin with; Carrie is offered a new job. Eddie Money guest stars.

programme.title: Two Thirty
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E24, When Doug goes to Dr. Farber (Tim Matheson) for a root canal, he finds out Carrie used to have a major crush on the dentist.

programme.title: Shrink Wrap
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E25, Carrie and Doug send Arthur to a psychiatrist (William Hurt), to whom he reveals his relationship with his father (Ben Stiller).

programme.title: Window Pain
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E01, Carrie becomes obsessed with trying to convince the new neighbors that she and Doug don't constantly fight.

programme.title: Arthur, Spooner
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E02, Team leader Carrie grows frustrated with her drab work group; Doug begins relying on Arthur's company in order to fall asleep.

programme.title: Kirbed Enthusiasm
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E03, Doug agrees to try out for a semiprofessional football league if Kirby will stay with peewee football.

programme.title: Holy Mackerel
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E04, Carrie's prayer for a raise is miraculously answered while in church, prompting her and Doug to start asking God to grant wishes.

programme.title: Relief Bartender
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E23, Woody feels replaceable when an entertaining bartender overshadows him.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E24, Sam expresses interest in politics when he falls for a woman running for city council.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E25, Diane quits when she finds out Sam's girlfriend wants her fired.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 3)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E26, Diane tries to make Sam's life miserable for pushing her out the door.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E01, It is revealed that it was Diane to whom Sam proposed on the telephone in the last episode.

programme.title: Cape Cad
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E02, Sam's date, Vicki, checks out of a country inn to visit her grandmother in the hospital.

programme.title: Money Dearest
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E03, Cliff fixes his mother, Esther, up with the wealthy Duncan Fitzgerald.

programme.title: Abnormal Psychology
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E04, Frasier appears on a television show for a debate with Dr. Lilith Stern.

programme.title: House Of Horrors With Formal Dining and Used Brick
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E05, Cliff stays the night when Carla gets spooked in her new house.

programme.title: Tan N' Wash
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E06, Norm is excited about a new business venture, a combination laundromat and tanning salon.

programme.title: Young Doctor Weinstein
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E07, Sam steals Diane's dinner reservations at a fancy restaurant.

programme.title: The Knights Of Scimitar
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E08, Diane tries to make Sam jealous by flirting with one of her students.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Orphans
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E09, The Cheers gang has a Thanksgiving feast at Carla's new house.

programme.title: Everyone Imitates Art
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E10, A magazine rejects Diane's poem and accepts Sam's writing instead.

programme.title: Book Of Samuel
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E11, Woody lies to his hometown girlfriend when she shows up with another guy.

programme.title: Dance, Diane, Dance
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E12, Diane is fooled into believing that she's a dance star waiting to happen.

programme.title: Chambers Vs. Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E13, Diane tricks Sam into proposing to her again and she accepts.

programme.title: Diamond Sam
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E14, Diane throws her engagement ring out the window when she mistakes it for a fake.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E15, Diane and Carla console Loretta, who has caught Nick cheating on her.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E16, Carla falls head over heals for hockey star Eddie LeBec, a newly acquired goalie for the Bruins.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E17, Carla realizes she's the reason Eddie's hockey game is suffering.

programme.title: One Last Fling
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E18, Diane and Sam agree to a twenty-four hour separation to purge other desires.

programme.title: Dog Bites Cliff
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E19, Cliff files a lawsuit and ends up getting blindsided by the beautiful defendant.

programme.title: Dinner At Eight-Ish
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E20, The regulars meet over dinner to discuss Frasier asking Lilith to move in.

programme.title: Simon Says
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E21, Diane and Sam are given a bleak prognosis from a noted marriage counselor.

programme.title: The Godfather (Part III)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E22, Sam flips out when his goddaughter visits and agrees to move in with Woody.

programme.title: Norm's First Hurrah
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E23, Norm lies about the prestige of his new position at a CPA firm.

programme.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E24, Woody's parents want him to move back home, but the regulars try to keep him.

programme.title: A House Is Not A Home
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E25, Sam and Diane buy a house from a couple who have been there for forty years.

programme.title: I Do, Adieu
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Home Is The Sailor
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E01, Sam returns to Cheers after sailing around the world and wants his job back.

programme.title: "I" On Sports
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E02, Sam accepts an offer from his friend, sportscaster Dave Richards.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E03, Carla and Eddie battle superstitions when they decide to get married.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

MST3K: Viking Women And The Sea Serpent, 19911026000000 +0000, The crew watches an educational short about the wonders a home economics major can do for young women in The Home Economics Story (1951). In The Saga of the Viking Women Sea Serpent (1957), lonely Viking women set sail to rescue a group of enslaved men.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 19700101000000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

Side Hackers, 19900928000000 +0000, A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other. Joel and the Bots write a song inspired by the movie and chat with a few characters from the film on the Hexfield.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 1: Beneath The Ocean Floor
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E14, A scientist and a reporter discover the lost city of Atlantis, a technologically advanced society.
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.
MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).
MST3K: Munchie, 20220527000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.
MST3K: Doctor Mordrid, 20220610000000 +0000, Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

Just the Way You Are, 20150509000000 +0000, When Jennie's marriage to Ian hits the doldrums after 15 years, Jennie insists he goes on a blind date - with her. By rediscovering each other as "newly-mets," they get a second chance to fall in love.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

Love Locks, 20170128000000 +0000, A woman returns to Paris after 20 years and begins a journey of romance and rediscovery when she reconnects with her college boyfriend and first love. Stars Rebecca Romijn and Jerry O'Connell.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.

programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Like mother, like daughter!

programme.title: Running Scared

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abby returns to Maryland when she receives a phone call from her sister.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

Stargate Origins: Catherine, 20180619000000 +0000, 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

Stargate: Continuum, 20080729000000 +0000, In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

Stargate: The Ark of Truth, 20080101080000 +0000, When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 1
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E11, Captain Carter unwillingly becomes the host to a dying Tok'ra, a member of the resistance whose noble goal is to overthrow the evil Goa'uld empire. Now she sees through the Tok'ra's eyes, but can her visions help the SG-1 team save the Tok'ra?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 2
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E12, The Tok'ra are desperate for hosts so they can continue fighting the Goa'uld. Carter's father, who is dying of cancer, has nothing to lose by volunteering his body. But will he die during the transference...or does fate have something else in store?

programme.title: Spirits
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E13, SG-11 vanishes while negotiating the mining rights on a planet inhabited by a tribe known as the Salish. Can the SG-1 team find their lost colleagues without angering the planet's mystical spirits...or will they become their next victims?

programme.title: Touchstone
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E14, A climate-controlling touchstone is stolen from planet Madrona, causing the weather to rapidly deteriorate. And when the SG-1 team is accused of the theft, O'Neill must pursue the real thief and rescue the missing stone before Madrona perishes.

programme.title: The Fifth Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E15, While studying alien wall inscriptions on another planet, O'Neill peers into a viewer that unleashes ancient knowledge into his mind like computer virus. Can the SG-1 team reverse the process before his mind is completely reconfigured.

programme.title: A Matter Of Time
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E16, A black hole swallows the SG-10 team, and O'Neill is sent on a rescue mission. As the hole's pull grows stronger, it draws the Stargate toward it and soon threatens to destroy Earth. Will O'Neill find a way to stop this super-destructive force?

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E13, Mitch learns that a cache of US Marine weapons has been stolen and probably hidden offshore. Mitch and Cody locate a sunken vessel with the arms on board, but before they can confiscate them, they are taken captive.

programme.title: Surf City
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E14, After breaking up with Manny, April finds romance with Craig, who is having a mid-life crisis. While working together to catch a trio of wild men on waverunners harassing swimmers, Craig and April's passion heats up.

programme.title: To the Max
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E15, Mitch uses Hobie to initiate a relationship with Hobie's horseback riding instructor. Cody, JD, and Lani try to make extra cash in a scheme to collect Sea Urchins, but when another diver gets into trouble, Lani puts her life at risk to save him.

programme.title: Night of the Dolphin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E16, Garner enlists Mitch’s help to track down and capture a ring of drug smugglers operating from a boat offshore. The stakes get deadly when Neely goes undercover to plant a bug and her cover is blown! Lani struggles to come to terms with her deafness.

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E17, Cody makes a crazy bet with some local hotshots. Mitch risks his uncle's new Scarab in a wild race. Meanwhile, Neely and her baby daughter Ashley move in with Mitch for a couple of days sparking a twist to their relationship.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E18, After a swimmer shows symptoms of a deadly virus, headquarters is quarantined, trapping Mitch, April, Donna, and JD inside with an annoying salesman. With JD waylaid, Newman takes on his plum assignment overseeing a photoshoot of sexy models.

programme.title: Diabolique
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E19, After he saves Neely's new nanny from a boating disaster, she develops a lethal attraction to Mitch. April and Manny join a charity contest arranged by Newmie for his juvenile diabetic nephew.

programme.title: Bon Voyage
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E20, While Lani prepares for a photo shoot on a cruise to Alaska, Neely travels to see her ex-husband who lives in Juneau. Hobie's good fortune lands him, Mitch and Cody on the cruise ship to Alaska as well, but danger lurks onboard.

programme.title: White Thunder at Glacier Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E21, Mitch and Cody surprise Neely and Lani by showing up on the Dawn Princess. During the stop in Juneau, Gavin finally recognizes Leslie, who takes a clueless Hobie with her at the beginning of a harrowing chase…

programme.title: White Thunder at Glacier Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S08E22, After an escalating, heart-stopping chase across a glacier, Mitch rescues Hobie and Leslie from hitman Gavin. Mitch returns to the Dawn Princess with a romantic proposal for Neely.

programme.title: Crash, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E01, Mitch's marriage to Neely falls apart when her ex-husband arrives at Baywatch and they learn the truth about their cruise ship wedding. Cody and April fly to New York, but a frantic rescue effort ensues when their plane crashes during take-off.

programme.title: Crash, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E02, Mitch struggles with Neely's lies and the truth about their shipboard wedding. Cody and April race to save survivors of their plane crash. A tragic turn of events puts April in mortal danger when half the plane's fuselage sinks beneath the Pacific.

programme.title: Sharks, Lies and Videotape
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E03, Captain Alexis "Alex" Ryker, the conniving CEO of a private lifeguard company, wants to take over Baywatch to expand her private lifeguarding empire. Mitch suspects Alex of setting up fake rescues and recruits Cody to spy on the BayGuard team.

programme.title: Dolphin Quest
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E04, Cody accompanies Alex on a vacation to Hawaii where she wants to take her autistic 10-year-old nephew, Timmy, to swim with a dolphin in the local lagoon. Cody spends quality time with Lani's sister, Callie, a local Hawaiian lifeguard.

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E05, A mysterious lifeguard makes rescues around Baywatch, then vanishes. After going over Mitch's head one too many times, Alex gets an annoying new partner.

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E06, April suffers PTSD after losing a rescue victim. Mitch and the victim's widow refused to give up searching for his body. Jessie runs into an old beau who could undermine her future at Baywatch.

programme.title: Hot Summer Night
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E07, Hobie struggles with his irresponsible actions leading to a boating accident that leaves a girl in a coma. Jessie is gripped with fear after April tells her of a recent, job-related tragedy.
